titles.title: CB 167 God is My Refuse and My Strength

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
GOD IS MY REFUGE AND MY STRENGTH,
A present help in time of need.
He is my fortress and my deliverer,
my Father, my friend indeed.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, You're my Shepherd, I shall not want.
You make me to lie down in peace.
You lead me beside the still waters of life.
My soul is restored at Your feet.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Yea though I walk through the valley of death,
I will not fear any harm.
Your rod and Your staff they comfort me,
And You will not leave me alone.
